thread.title: This Dye Changes Your Hair Color According to Temperature and Mood
thread.title_full: This Dye Changes Your Hair Color According to Temperature and Mood

author: Ashley Weatherford
title: This Dye Changes Your Hair Color According to Temperature and Mood
text: It’s a universal rule that an office is always extremely hot or extremely cold — and that there’s always one person from finance who declares the temperature to be “just fine.” Here’s one impractical (but definitive) way to end the perennial debate: the Unseen’s color-changing hair dye. The semi-permanent hair... More »
